医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生长激素释放激素改变健康和慢性疾病的治疗潜力研究人员回顾了生长激素释放激素及其类似物的生物活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Growth-hormone-releasing-hormone-transforms-therapeutic-potial-in-health-and-chronic-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Growth-hormone-releasing-hormone-transforms-therapeutic-potial-in-health-and-chronic-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f412c90b-ed9f-4938-9b2c-d422de9d2899 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:22:00 -0500 Growth hormone-releasing hormone transforms therapeutic potential in health and chronic disease
工程病毒样颗粒不断进化以实现卓越的基因传递效率研究人员开发了一种用于工程病毒样颗粒 (eVLP) 的条形码定向进化系统，创建了具有增强的生产、转导和基因编辑效率的第五代 (v5) eVLP。该系统可以为治疗应用中改进基因递送载体铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-virus-like-articles-evolve-for-superior-gene-delivery-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Engineered-virus-like-articles-evolve-for-superior-gene-delivery-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3a01f36-c360-4cbe-92e3-e5c78e038125 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 23:12:00 -0500 Engineered virus-like particles evolve for superior gene delivery efficiency
你是否被假新闻所迷惑？年龄和分析思维可能会拯救你老年人和分析性思想家擅长辨别真假新闻，而意识形态偏见和政治身份则以不同的方式影响错误信息的敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Are-you-falling-for-fake-news-Age-and-analytical-thinking-might-save-you.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241117/Are-you-falling-for-fake-news-Age-and-analytical-thinking-might-save-you.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d7690f3-e306-436a-8dbd-370a3d889242 Sun, 17 Nov 2024 21:08:00 -0500 Are you falling for fake news? Age and analytical thinking might save you
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种新的癫痫治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
蓝光照射可能会加速大鼠的骨骼生长和青春期提前暴露于蓝光（例如智能手机或平板电脑发出的蓝光）可能会加速骨骼生长和骨龄，导致老鼠青春期提前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Blue-light-exposure-may-accelerate-bone-growth-and-early-puberty-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Blue-light-exposure-may-accelerate-bone-growth-and-early-puberty-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=775929f7-3ad6-4273-a2cb-56c3bc35b421 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:35:00 -0500 Blue light exposure may accelerate bone growth and early puberty in rats
研究揭示了沙门氏菌逃避肠道防御的能力加州大学戴维斯分校健康中心的一项新研究发现，即使存在保护性细菌，沙门氏菌（食物中毒的主要原因）也可以侵入肠道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Research-sheds-light-on-Salmonellae28099s-ability-to-escape-gut-defenses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Research-sheds-light-on-Salmonellae28099s-ability-to-escape-gut-defenses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0054523-512d-49cd-8665-c65c918bc631 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 18:47:00 -0500 Research sheds light on Salmonella’s ability to escape gut defenses
